mapper.select: select rowid from tbl_sequence where tid='F003'
mapper.update: update tbl_sequence set rowid = #{rowid} where tid='F003'
mapper.select: select * from tbl_apply where bid=#{bid} order by regdate
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_apply (aid, applicant, content, bid) values (#{aid},#{applicant},#{content},#{bid})
mapper.update: update tbl_apply set content=#{content} where aid=#{aid}
